review: We had been to the doctor and it was for my wife. She had broken her leg and got injured. ****** *** ****** **** *** I appreciate his behavior and treatment. Only issue was waiting time, it was for a couple of hours. I had 2 -3 hours of waiting time. I am satisfied with the treatment given. I can recommend doctor to my family or friends. Scanning and X-ray was done for her. Doctor was orthopedic and I would recommend if anyone asks. I had 3-4 visits to hospital. Treatment was good and he was professional and very helpful. She was able to recover. I would rate the doctor 5/5.

He was good. I visited for back pain treatment. Doctor behaviour was decent, listened to our problem and was totally satisfied with doctor treatment. There was a 5-10 minutes waiting time to consult the doctor. I got to know about doctor from practo and he was a very decent doctor, giving proper time and a good doctor so I would like to recommend this doctor to my family and friends. I would like to give a rating of 5/5.

He is good. I visited for my wife's neck pain treatment. Doctor prescribed pain relief, cream which were helpful. There was not much waiting time for the doctor. I would like to recommend this doctor to others. Doctor was polite and listened to our problems. I am satisfied with doctor treatment and I would like to give a rating of 9/10.
I visited the doctor. The consultation was good. He prescribed medicines and I would recommend the doctor to my family or friends.
